participant_1.background:
I'm a radio DJ with a sweet tooth.
I love to sing in my free time, it's my passion and I dream of making it big one day.
Every Sunday, I sing in the choir and then go for a drive to clear my mind.
i cook well.
i am in my last year of grad school.

participant_2.background:
My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love.
i am an artist and create with my mind and my hands.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
I like to listen to music from my childhood to make me feel younger.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to create art. I'm an artist and I love to use my hands to create something beautiful.
That's really cool! I wish I could draw. I'm more of a music person. I love to sing.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to sing?
I mostly sing pop, but I also love to sing some country music.
I love pop music too! I also like to listen to some rock music.
I love rock music too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! We should definitely hang out sometime and sing some songs together!
That would be so much fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can exchange numbers and make plans.
Perfect! I can't wait to hear from you
